name: indiv
description: 一个 web mvvm 库。A web mvvm library.

scripts.start: npm run clean && webpack --watch --mode=development & nodemon app.js
scripts.start:js: npm run build && webpack --watch --env=testjs --mode=development & nodemon app.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:core && npm run build:platform-browser && npm run build:common && npm run build:router
scripts.build:core: rm -rf build/core && rollup --config packages/core/rollup.typescript.config.js && rollup --config packages/core/rollup.config.js && rm -rf build/core/bundle.js
scripts.build:platform-browser: rm -rf build/platform-browser && rollup --config packages/platform-browser/rollup.typescript.config.js && rollup --config packages/platform-browser/rollup.config.js && rm -rf build/platform-browser/bundle.js
scripts.build:common: rm -rf build/common && rollup --config packages/common/rollup.typescript.config.js && rollup --config packages/common/rollup.config.js && rm -rf build/common/bundle.js && rm -rf build/platform-browser/bundle.js
scripts.build:router: rm -rf build/router && rollup --config packages/router/rollup.typescript.config.js && rollup --config packages/router/rollup.config.js && rm -rf build/router/bundle.js

author: DimaLiLongJi
